name: simple-graphql
description: The simple way to generates GraphQL schemas and Sequelize models from your models definition.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && babel src --optional runtime --out-dir lib/ && cp package.json lib/ && npm run build-dot-flow
scripts.build-dot-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.buildAndPublish: npm run flow && npm run format && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.docs: documentation build -c documentation.yml --sort-order alpha -f md -o docs/API.md src/index.js src/Definition.js

author: logerzhu
